title.rendered: Olaplex No.7 Bonding Oil is Coming & You Need It!

content.rendered:
Introducing Olaplex No.7 Bonding Oil. It’s no secret that Olaplex has completely revolutionised the way we care for our manes. Olaplex’s proven repairing technology has allowed us to drastically lighten our hair in one sitting without damage and heat style our hair day in day out all while leaving our tresses feeling hydrated, strong and shiny…something that we once thought was too good to be true.

Following the launch of the Olaplex No.6 Bond Smoother, the masterminds at Olaplex HQ have extended the leave-in Olaplex line with the highly anticipated Olaplex Bonding Oil.

We are excited to announce that Olaplex No.7 Bonding Oil is coming in October! Want to get your hands on Olaplex Bonding Oil? Pre-Order Online or Contact Us to arrange the correct product and delivery! We will also throw some deluxe samples with all orders!

Formulated with Olaplex Bond Building Chemistry. Olaplex No.7 Bonding Oil is a highly concentrated, weightless and repairing styling oil. Dramatically increases shine, softness, and color vibrancy. Minimises fly-aways and frizz.

Key Ingredients & Benefits

  • Patented Bis – Aminopropyl Diglycol Dimaleate – helps protect and restore damaged hair by repairing disulphide bonds broken during chemical processing. Bleach, peroxide, perms and chemical straighteners damage hair at a molecular level, leaving hair more fragile and susceptible to breaking. Bis – Aminopropyl Diglycol Dimaleate is a truly innovative ingredient with protective, nourishing and restructuring action for rejuvenating hair. Only available in Olaplex products.
  • Repairs damaged and compromised hair like other Olaplex products
  • Strengthens and protects hair structure
  • Improved lustre, shine, and manageability
  • UV protection
  • Shortened drying time
  • Softening and detangling on all hair textures
